library(tidyverse)
library(targets)

percentage_columns <- function(
    data,
    accuracy = 0.1
) {
    data %>% 
        mutate(across(where(is.numeric), scales::percent, accuracy = accuracy)) %>%
        return()
}

analysis <-

    magrittr::extract2("analysis") %>% 
    magrittr::extract2(1)
